channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fire-ravaged Southern California braces for gusty winds and heightened wildfire risk
item.description: Southern Californians are bracing for gusty winds and a heightened risk of wildfires less than two weeks after deadly blazes that have killed at least 27 people and ravaged thousands of homes.

item.title: Millions across the US brace for plummeting temperatures and winter storms
As Trump returns to the White House, families prepare for mass deportations
